You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesR R] > &ratail;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&rAtail;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/291c/index.htm U+0291C].
  * `&ratail;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/291a/index.htm U+0291A].
